Module it.polimi.ingsw
Package it.polimi.ingsw.model.characters

Class MainBoardCharacters

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.characters.CharacterCard
it.polimi.ingsw.model.characters.MainBoardCharacters
public class MainBoardCharacters extends CharacterCard
GameCharacter class modelling the character that modifies the state of the gameBoard

    • MainBoardCharacters

  • Method Details

    • applyEffect

      public void applyEffect(CharacterStruct params)
      This method overrides the standard behaviour of the CharacterCard class, parent of MainBoardCharacters, by implementing all the game effects concerning the change of state of the game's main board
      Overrides:
      applyEffect in class CharacterCard
      Parameters:
      params - A struct containing all the object modifiable by any effect. This makes the applyEffect method in all the different child class have the same signature, thus making it interchangeable

    • removeEffect

      public void removeEffect(CharacterStruct params)
      This method overrides the standard behaviour of the CharacterCard class, parent of MainBoardCharacters, by removing all the game effects concerning the change of state of the game's main board. It removes only those effects that need it but still has a case for each possible effect to ensure complete interchangeability
      Overrides:
      removeEffect in class CharacterCard
      Parameters:
      params - A struct containing all the object modifiable by any effect. This makes the removeEffect method in all the different child class have the same signature, thus making it interchangeable

    • takeStudentPutIslandEffect

      private void takeStudentPutIslandEffect(MainBoard mainBoard, int numIsland, Color color)
      This method implements the Character Card used to take one student from this card and put it in one island
      Parameters:
      mainBoard - The game's main board object
      numIsland - The number of the affected island
      color - Color of the student to be moved

    • noEntryNatureEffect

      private void noEntryNatureEffect(MainBoard mainBoard, int numIsland)
      This method implements the Character Card used to block the movement of Mother Nature on one island
      Parameters:
      mainBoard - The game's main board object
      numIsland - The number of the affected island that can't be used by mother nature this turn

    • yesEntryNatureEffect

      private void yesEntryNatureEffect(MainBoard mainBoard, int numIsland)
      This method removes the effect of the Character Card used to block the movement of Mother Nature on one island
      Parameters:
      mainBoard - The game's main board object
      numIsland - The number of the affected island that has to be reverted

    • noTowersInfluenceEffect

      private void noTowersInfluenceEffect(MainBoard mainBoard)

      mainBoard - The game's main board object

      private void noInfluenceColorEffect(MainBoard mainBoard, Color color)

      Parameters:
      mainBoard - The game's main board object
      color - The color whose influence will not be counted
